scripts.build: cp -f web/index_build.html build/web/index.html && cp -fr web/res build/web && cat web/src/stats.js/stats.min.js LF web/src/pixi.js/pixi.min.js LF web/src/entitas/utils/Exceptions.js LF web/src/entitas/utils/Signal.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IComponent.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IMatcher.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/ISystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IExecuteSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IInitializeSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/Matcher.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/MatcherInterfaces.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/TriggerOnEvent.js LF web/src/entitas/Entity.js LF web/src/entitas/Group.js LF web/src/entitas/GroupObserver.js LF web/src/entitas/Pool.js LF web/src/entitas/ReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/Systems.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/CollectionExtension.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/GroupExtension.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/MatcherExtension.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/PoolExtension.js LF web/src/matchone/extensions/Pool.js LF web/src/matchone/generatedComponents.js LF web/src/matchone/generatedExtensions.js LF web/src/matchone/Constants.js LF web/src/matchone/utils/Input.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/AddViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/CreateGameBoardCacheSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/DestroySystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/FallSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/FillSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/GameBoardSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/ProcessInputSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/RemoveViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/RenderPositionSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/ScoreSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/AddViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/RemoveViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/controllers/GameController.js LF web/src/matchone/controllers/InputController.js LF web/src/matchone/controllers/ScoreLabelController.js LF web/src/matchone/Game.js LF web/main.js > build/matchone.js  && cat web/src/stats.js/stats.min.js LF web/src/pixi.js/pixi.min.js LF web/src/entitas/utils/Exceptions.js LF web/src/entitas/utils/Signal.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IComponent.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IMatcher.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/ISystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IExecuteSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IInitializeSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/interfaces/IReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/Matcher.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/MatcherInterfaces.js LF web/src/entitas/matcher/TriggerOnEvent.js LF web/src/entitas/Entity.js LF web/src/entitas/Group.js LF web/src/entitas/GroupObserver.js LF web/src/entitas/Pool.js LF web/src/entitas/ReactiveSystem.js LF web/src/entitas/Systems.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/CollectionExtension.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/GroupExtension.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/MatcherExtension.js LF web/src/entitas/extensions/PoolExtension.js LF web/src/matchone/extensions/Pool.js LF web/src/matchone/generatedComponents.js LF web/src/matchone/generatedExtensions.js LF web/src/matchone/Constants.js LF web/src/matchone/utils/Input.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/AddViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/CreateGameBoardCacheSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/DestroySystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/FallSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/FillSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/GameBoardSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/ProcessInputSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/RemoveViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/RenderPositionSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/ScoreSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/AddViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/systems/RemoveViewSystem.js LF web/src/matchone/controllers/GameController.js LF web/src/matchone/controllers/InputController.js LF web/src/matchone/controllers/ScoreLabelController.js LF web/src/matchone/Game.js LF web/main.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/matchone.min.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
